No more unwanted news feeds, notification bubbles or featured sections ‚Äì
Control your attention by hiding distracting content üôà

Simply right-click on a distracting element on any page and select "Hide".

All hidden content will remain hidden until the next time you load the page. To un-hide something, press the app icon and select the element to show.
